Special Requirements: PTE, TOEFL iBT, IELTS, Without GRE, Without GMAT, Without Maths, Application Fee Waiver (upto 100%)
Course: Pre-Master Program ( 1 Semester)
Speciality: Faster Offer TAT, Major City
Rankings: 192 in Webometrics Ranking of Germany National
Entry Requirements: Bachelor's degree with minimum 60% from a recognised university.
Remarks: This Pre-Master's program is designed for students who do not have a bachelor's degree in economics or whose bachelor's degree does not include sufficient quantitative ECTS credits. Important Note: The university might issue an unconditional offer based on PTE/DET, but this document is not accepted by the German high commission for student visa. For German student visa IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. For students from Nepal and Bangladesh, 70-75% in their previous studies is a mandatory requirement to avoid visa rejection. Students need to attend ISM's admission test. The fees of € 45 for the admission test have been waived off. As of now, students can attend the admission test for free. The admission test includes a written test and an interview. The written test can be written in India online via DAAD. The interview will be carried out online via Skype. Students will have to pay the enrollment fee of Euro 1500 once he/she gets admission. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Special Requirements: TOEFL iBT, IELTS, Without GRE, Without GMAT, Without Maths, Application Fee Waiver (upto 100%)
Course: Pre-Master (TestAS & APS waiver)
Open Semesters: May, Oct, Feb, Sep, Dec, Apr
Speciality: Faster Offer TAT, Major City
Entry Requirements: Bachelor's degree in any field other than Business with minimum 55% from a recognised university.
Remarks: Application fee of € 200 is waived off for KC. For all the Students from Nepal and Bangladesh, 70-75% in their previous studies is a mandatory requirement to avoid visa rejection. This program is for students applying to the MBM program who did not complete a bachelor's degree in a business-related field or Students applying to the MBM program who do not have at least 6.5 IELTS score or Students applying to the MBA program who do not have at least 6.5 IELTS score. Pre-Master program is a pathway program to the MBM or MBA. Programs offered are fully (state) recognized and accredited (FIBAA) by Wittenborg University of Applied Sciences, Netherlands (WUAS). Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting. Students applying to New European College are not required to obtain TestAS and APS certificates to study in Germany.
Application Deadline: Sep: 17 Jul, Oct: 28 Aug, Dec: 23 Oct, Feb: 5 Dec, Apr: 13 Feb, May: 3 Apr

Speciality: High Job Demand, Major City, No Interview Required

Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Course: BA (Hons) Animation Foundation - 4 years International Route ( University for the Creative Arts ) - Hamburg Campus (APS & TestAS waiver)
University: Berlin School of Business and Innovation (BSBI), Berlin and Hamburg
Speciality: Faster Offer TAT, Scholarship Available, Affordable University
Rankings: 187 in Webometrics Ranking of Germany National
Entry Requirements: Grade 12 with minimum 70% from a recognised institution. Student should be minimum 18 years old and have completed at least 12 years of schooling. Applicants from North India are required to have a minimum of 70-75% in their previous education to be eligible for admission.
Remarks: IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. Degree awarded by University for the Creative Arts. For all the students from Nepal and Bangladesh 70-75% in their previous studies is a mandatory requirement to avoid visa rejection. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting. This 4 year program includes a foundation program (1 year) + bachelors program(3 years). Exceptional portfolio creation will be available in this integrated international route foundation in art design and media course to guarantee you a direct progression into your BA degree course. MOI is acceptable for students from Nepal, but the student has to be a recent pass out (2 years), If not, the student can also opt for Duolingo with an overall score of 95+ for this course. TOEFL overall required score will be 46 with no section less than Listening: 12, Speaking: 18, Writing: 14, Reading: 13.TOEFL Home-based Edition is not accepted.

As of now, students can attend the admission test for free. The admission test includes a written test and an interview. The written test can be written in India online via DAAD. The interview will be carried out online via Skype. Students will have to pay the enrollment fee of Euro 1500 once he/she gets admission. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Course: Master of Arts in Design Leadership (18 Months) (APS required)
University: University of Europe for Applied Sciences
Speciality: Scholarship Available, Affordable University
Rankings: 205 in Webometrics Ranking of Germany National
Entry Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in design related area from a recognised university with minimum 60% and portfolio is required with up to 8 samples.
Remarks: IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. Important Note: The university might issue an unconditional offer based on PTE/DET, but these 2 documents are not accepted by the German high commission for student visa. A Bachelor of Arts or Bachelor of Science degree without specialisation is not accepted by UE. For all the students from Nepal and Bangladesh 70-75% in their previous studies is a mandatory requirement to avoid visa rejection. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting. Special Requirements: TOEFL iBT, IELTS, Without GRE, Without GMAT, Without Maths, Application Fee Waiver (upto 100%), Scholarship Available
Course: Global MBA ( University of Creative Arts) - Berlin Campus (APS waiver)
University: Berlin School of Business and Innovation (BSBI), Berlin and Hamburg
Speciality: Faster Offer TAT, Scholarship Available, MBA Programs
Rankings: 187 in Webometrics Ranking of Germany National
Entry Requirements: Bachelor's degree with minimum 60% from a recognised university or institution.Student should be minimum 21 years old. Applicants from North India are required to have a minimum of 70-75% in their previous education to be eligible for admission.
Remarks: IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. Degree awarded by University for the Creative Arts. For all the students from Nepal and Bangladesh 70-75% in their previous studies is a mandatory requirement to avoid visa rejection. The tuition fee mentioned is for 1 year and the total tuition fee for this program will be € 14,850. TOEFL IBT overall score will be 80 with no section less than -Listening 17, Reading 18, Speaking 20, Writing 17 is required. TOEFL Home-based Edition is not accepted. MOI is acceptable for students from Nepal, but the student has to be a recent pass out (2 years), If not, the student can also opt for Duolingo with an overall score of 105+ for both UG and PG. All the students from Bangladesh are required to have completed either bachelor's + master' degree from Bangladesh or bachelor's from any other country to be eligible for master's program in BSBI. If a student does not have an IELTS overall score of 6.5 then needs to attend an English Test. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Speciality: Faster Offer TAT, Scholarship Available, Affordable University
Rankings: 187 in Webometrics Ranking of Germany National
Entry Requirements: Bachelor's degree with minimum 60% from a recognised university or institution.Student should be minimum 21 years old. Applicants from North India are required to have a minimum of 70-75% in their previous education to be eligible for admission.
Remarks: IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. Degree awarded by University for the Creative Arts. For all the students from Nepal and Bangladesh 70-75% in their previous studies is a mandatory requirement to avoid visa rejection. The tuition fee mentioned is for 1 year and the total tuition fee for this program will be € 13,250. TOEFL IBT Overall score will be 80 with no section less than -Listening 17, Reading 18, Speaking 20, and Writing 17 is required. TOEFL Home-based Edition is not accepted. MOI is acceptable for students from Nepal, but the student has to be a recent pass out (2 years), If not, the student can also opt for Duolingo with an overall score of 105+ for both UG and PG. All the students from Bangladesh are required to have completed either bachelor's + master' degree from Bangladesh or bachelor's from any other country to be eligible for master's program in BSBI. If a student does not have an IELTS overall score of 6.5 then needs to attend an English Test. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Course: Master in Artificial Intelligence for Business (APS waiver)
Speciality: Faster Offer TAT, High Job Demand
Rankings: 38 in Webometrics Ranking of Germany National
Entry Requirements: Bachelor's degree with minimum 60% from a recognised university.
Remarks: 3 Semester course in one year. IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. Important Note: The university might issue an unconditional offer based on PTE/DET, but these 2 documents are not accepted by the German high commission for student visa. For German student visa IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. For all the students from Nepal and Bangladesh 70-75% in their previous studies is a mandatory requirement to avoid visa rejection. Application fee of € 200 will be charged once the student gets the offer letter from EU Business School which will be included in Offer Letter and has to be paid when a student decides to pay the tuition fees. Students applying from Pakistan, Nepal, Bangladesh, and Sri Lanka are required to pay the € 200 Application fee (Non-refundable) before the Admission Interview. Students from the Punjab region will be required to pay deposit + first-semester tuition fee in order to confirm their place. Students applying from Punjab and Haryana are required to submit APS Certificate for other Indian States it is not required. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Rankings: 192 in Webometrics Ranking of Germany National
Entry Requirements: Bachelor's degree with minimum 60% in Economics or at least 30 ECTS credits from the subject areas of Economics, Marketing, PR or Market Research from a recognised university.
Remarks: Important Note: The university might issue an unconditional offer based on PTE/DET, but this document is not accepted by the German high commission for student visa. For German student visa IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. For students from Nepal and Bangladesh, 70-75% in their previous studies is a mandatory requirement to avoid visa rejection. Students need to attend ISM's admission test. The fees of € 45 for the admission test have been waived off. As of now, students can attend the admission test for free. The admission test includes a written test and an interview. The written test can be written in India online via DAAD. The interview will be carried out online via Skype. Students will have to pay the enrollment fee of Euro 1500 once he/she gets admission. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Entry Requirements: Students with minimum 60% in grade 12 will be eligible for this foundation program which leads to bachelor's degree( 1 Year foundation + 3 Years bachelor's ). If student's qualifications are more than 3 years old, university may also ask to see a professional CV.
Remarks: Important Note: The university might issue an unconditional offer based on PTE/DET, but these 2 documents are not accepted by the German high commission for student visa. For german student visa IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. For all the students from Nepal and Bangladesh 70-75% in their previous studies is a mandatory requirement to avoid visa rejection. Student must be of 18 years and above to be eligible for bachelor's degree program. TOEFL overall required score will be 46 with no section less than Listening: 4-6, Speaking: 14-15, Writing: 14-17, Reading: 4-7. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Remarks: Successful completion of the programme allows progression to BSc (Hons) Business Management with Business Analytics. Important Note: The university might issue an unconditional offer based on PTE/DET, but this document is not accepted by the German high commission for student visa. For German student visa IELTS/TOEFL is a mandatory requirement. Students applying to Lancaster University Leipzig are not required to obtain the APS certificate to study in Germany. Tuition Fee mentioned is for 1 year, full course tuition fees for this program will be € 22,000. International Foundation Year is designed for students who either do not meet the entry requirements for direct entry (English level, school qualifications, etc.) or would like to gain additional subject or academic skills and confidence prior to the start of their degree course. Progression Options after completing this foundation course - BSc (Hons) Business Management and BSc (Hons) Accounting and Finance. TOEFL Overall score required will be 60 with minimum of 11 in listening, 8 in reading, 11 in speaking & 15 in writing. Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Special Requirements: Without English Proficiency, Without GRE, Without GMAT, Without Maths
Course: Medical Foundation Track - 12 Weeks - Intensive course (APS required)
University: University Targu Mures Medical Campus, Hamburg (UMCH)

Before submitting the application to the institution, KC team will connect with the student for an initial discussion over a video call through WhatsApp/Google Meet/Teams Meeting.

Special Requirements: Without GRE, Without GMAT
Course: T Course (Technik - Technology/Engineering Studienkolleg Course) (APS and TestAS Required)
Entry Requirements: Grade 12 with a minimum 60% from a recognised institution. Proof of German language proficiency of at least B1 and Test report from uni-assist (VDP - preliminary examination documentation) are Mandatory Requirement
Remarks: The student must have a background in Mathematics. Additionally, applicants who do not possess a B2 level German language proficiency are not eligible to apply directly. Students with at least an A1 level in German may apply for a German Language Course in order to progress into this Studienkolleg program.
